text: Ate jadom' musa ne apani kauma nu akhi'a, apane upara alaha de usa upakara nu yada karom, jadom usa ne tuhanu phira'auna di kauma tom chuda'i'a, jihare tuhanu bahuta dukha dide sana ate jihare tuhade putaram nu mara dide sana. Tuhadi'am auratam nu ji'unde rakhade sana. Ate usa vica tuhade raba valom vada imatihana si
